programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.desc: All gangster Tommy Spinelli wants to do is deliver his carry-on duffel bag to his boss. Unfortunately, the bag is switched with a Mexican-bound medical student...who has no idea that the bag contains the severed heads of eight Los Angeles gangsters!

programme.desc: Two young men from Jamaica climb to the top of the criminal world in Miami, with a constant presence of drugs, extortion, and deceit.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Crime)

programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Marlowe, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlowe, a gripping thriller set in 1939 LA. Hard-boiled private eye, Philip Marlowe, is hired to find the lover of a glamorous heiress. Unexpectedly, Marlowe finds himself embroiled in a deadly mystery that he's determined to either solve or die trying.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another manâs body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Runaway Bride, (1999, Romance)

programme.desc: From a married couple about to renew their vows, to a career-focused woman pursued by a charming stranger, to a young couple who meet in the L.A. club scene, it's a sexy romantic comedy about modern couples coming together in funny, unexpected ways!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!

programme.title: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!

programme.title: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre's group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!

programme.title: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!

programme.title: Otama's temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido's Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: Southpaw (2015)
programme.desc: After losing everything to a senseless tragedy, a boxer (Jake Gyllenhaal) turns to a retired fighter (Forest Whitaker) for guidance as he struggles toward redemption.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Twisted (2004)
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs (2024)
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss, a former homicide detective tries to solve a brutal murder that he cant recall. As he pieces together evidence from a decade-old investigation, he soon uncovers a sinister web of buried secrets tied to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: Danger Close (2019)
programme.desc: Australian and New Zealand soldiers face overwhelming odds as they fight for their lives during the Battle of Long Tan in Vietnam.

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: The Other Guys (2010)
programme.desc: Two deskbound detectives get more than they bargain for when they take on a seemingly minor case that may turn out to be New Yorks biggest crime.

programme.title: Guns Up (2025)
programme.desc: After a job goes horribly wrong, a man who moonlights as a mob henchman has one night to get his family out of the city while keeping his dark secret hidden.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Scream 4 (2011)
programme.desc: The Ghostface Killer returns with a vengeance when self-help author Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) arrives in Woodsboro on the last stop of her book tour.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.sub-title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a traveling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)
programme.desc: A goofy janitor (David Spade) tells a radio talk-show host (Dennis Miller) about his search for the parents who abandoned him.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: The wildest fishing to be found in Africa and the Indian Ocean.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: South Africas largest port city, Durban, forms a perfect melting pot of deep calm waters and warm currents, which in turn brings in the big game fish; its time to see what Durban has to offer!

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Tommo fishes the lower Zambezi River, staying on a live aboard boat and fishing with Cuan Meredith, the owner of River Gods adventures. They fish with baits, targeting a variety of species of fish, some of which are endemic to the lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: Majestic Mount Kenya rises to over 5000 meters and this magnificent monolithis often shrouded by mist and snow, hard to believe this close to the equator.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Fresh off their Lake Powell victory, Denis teams up once again with Austin and Rylan for a new adventure at Dworshak Reservoir in Idaho. Nestled in a rugged canyon, this lake delivers on its reputation with monster smallmouth bass.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild With Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Joe and Nick brave the frigid Arctic seas for the giant Atlantic halibut. Fish butchery lessons as Mike breaks down a 180lb halibut and cooks a festive Thors Hammer.
